channel.title: Need help with opening run.exe!
channel.description:
well now that your here please help me!
i downloaded some 525/508 clients i extract them to my documents i open the folder and im like "finally its done" then when i open run.exe this is what happens
i open the batch file and on the batch file window it says Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Loader Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Loader at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Loader. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
then i don't know what to do
plz help
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Need help with opening run.exe!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

In side of the compile.bat or on most 508 its build.bat should look somewhat like this not the same for all source so…

@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.model.games "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/model/games/*.java pausei got jdk1.6.0_17 so i need to change

jdk1.6.0_07

to this

jdk1.6.0_17

so the final code would look like this

@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.model.games "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/model/games/*.java pausei hope that helps.

Read full topic
